SPECIFICATIONS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#ffffff” width=”70vw” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”40px|||-30vw||” custom_margin_tablet=”30px|||0vw” custom_margin_phone=”0px||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”60px|50px|70px|50px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|40px|50px|40px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” background_last_edited=”on|phone” background_enable_color_phone=”off” box_shadow_style=”preset2″ box_shadow_vertical=”28px” box_shadow_blur=”40px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.1)” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column_inner saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Engine
Model & Type Six Cylinder, TCIC, water cooled diesel engine rated power 137 hp@2200 rpm.
Transmission
Type Heavy duty transmission for crane application. Synchromesh gearbox with auxiliary gearbox, Eight forward and two reverse speeds with high and low selector.
AXLE
Front Rigidly mounted
Rear Mounted with two semielliptical springs
Speed(top) 40 kmph.
Gradeability 40% unladen
Clutch Single plate, heavy duty dry friction type clutch plate especially designed for crane application.
Driv 2 wheel drive
STEERING
Type Articulated power steering, hydraulically controlled through two double acting hydraulic rams.
Articulation upto 35°
Turning Radius 10 m
BRAKES
Front wheel Fully air operated ‘S’ cam dual circuit brakes on front and rear wheels.
Parking Air operated fail safe brakes on front and rear wheels.
TYRE
Front 12.00×24 – 20 PR (4 Nos.)
Rear 14.00×25 – 20 PR (2 Nos.)
Wheel Base 5.0 m
Wheel Tracks
Front 1980 mm
Rear 1840 mm
BOOM
Telescoping 5 part boom, 4 part hydraulically powered & semi synchronised. 5th part power extended and manually pinned for safety.
Derricking Through two double acting cylinders.
HOIST MECHANISM
Hoist Eight falls with fail safe brake.
HYDRAULIC SYSTEM
Pump Vane/gear type hydraulic pump.
Control Valve 5/6 spool control valve double acting with built in pressure relief valve for trouble free operation.
ELECTRICAL SYSTEM
Type 24V, DC dual battery negative earth.
OVERALL DIMENSIONS
Length 11350 mm
Width 2778 mm
Height 3286 mm
OPERATING WEIGHT 20060 Kg

[/et_pb_code][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.indofarm.in/brochure/crane/Indo_Power_30%20FNX.pdf” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Download Brochure” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291″ custom_margin=”25px||25px||true|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291%22:%91%22button_text_color%22%93}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||2px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px|0px|50px|15px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_css_main_element__hover_enabled=”off|desktop”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”2caebda7-1c6a-4d05-9d5d-92ad76e16d75″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#21B354″ header_font_size=”3rem” header_letter_spacing=”5px” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”1.5rem” header_2_line_height=”2.5rem” header_3_font_size=”3rem” background_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”10%||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”10%||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”3rem” header_font_size_phone=”2rem” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_letter_spacing_tablet=”5px” header_letter_spacing_phone=”3px” header_letter_spacing_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Indo power Crane

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Load capacity : 30T
Boom Height: 24.31 m, 27.25 m with fly zib
Horizontal reach 22 m, 25 m with fly zib
Engine Power: 137 hp@2200 rpm
